data.title: THE SLEEPING BEAUTY by HOFFMANN, Felix; GRIMM, The Brothers [Wilhelm and Jakob]: (1959)
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Hardcover - London: Oxford University Press. - 1959 - Dust Jacket Included - First UK edition, first printing. Original illustrated paper-covered boards with a cloth spine, in dustwrapper. Illustrated throughout in colour by Felix Hoffman. A very good copy, the binding firm and clean, a little rubbed to the extremities and very slightly bumped at the corners. The contents, with a previous owner's name to the title page, are otherwise clean throughout. Complete with the original torn and creased dustwrapper which has a significant chip to the bottom edge of the front panel and a smaller chip to the head of the spine. Not price-clipped (12s. 6d. to the front flap). A beautifully designed edition of Sleeping Beauty illustrated by the Swiss illustrator and stained glass artist Felix Hoffmann. Part of a series of Brothers Grimm tales illustrated by Hoffmann. Further details and images for any of the items listed are available on request. Lucius Books welcomes direct contact with our customers. - THE SLEEPING BEAUTY
data.text:
About this Item

First UK edition, first printing. Original illustrated paper-covered boards with a cloth spine, in dustwrapper. Illustrated throughout in colour by Felix Hoffman. A very good copy, the binding firm and clean, a little rubbed to the extremities and very slightly bumped at the corners. The contents, with a previous owner's name to the title page, are otherwise clean throughout. Complete with the original torn and creased dustwrapper which has a significant chip to the bottom edge of the front panel and a smaller chip to the head of the spine. Not price-clipped (12s. 6d. to the front flap). A beautifully designed edition of Sleeping Beauty illustrated by the Swiss illustrator and stained glass artist Felix Hoffmann. Part of a series of Brothers Grimm tales illustrated by Hoffmann. Further details and images for any of the items listed are available on request. Lucius Books welcomes direct contact with our customers. Seller Inventory # 23837

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship on the same day as the order is processed. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
